dmca.title: CDGMedia DMCA Complaint - IMPORTANT [ThePlanetAbuse-C3628415D]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, March 25, 2007 10:22 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Fw: CDGMedia DMCA Complaint - IMPORTANT
[ThePlanetAbuse-C3628415D]

This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed
important enough for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for
review and applicable action.

Abuse Department
The Planet


=====================

----- Original Message -----=20
From: LLOYD COX=20
To: abuse@planet.com=20
Cc: managers@midphase.com=20
Sent: Monday, March 26, 2007 2:28 AM
Subject: CDGMedia DMCA Complaint - IMPORTANT=20


Hi,

I just talked to a rep from planet.com and was advised to first send an
=
email to abuse@planet.com

I am the copyright holder of pictures being hosted on a website through
=
a host that buys bandwith from planet.

The trace route is as follows:

The domain name in question is gamnow.com and the host is midphase.com =
Traceroute follows:

      1 1 0 0  66.98.244.1 gphou-66-98-244-1.ev1servers.net=20
      2 0 0 0  66.98.241.16 gphou-66-98-241-16.ev1servers.net=20
      3 0 0 0  66.98.240.6 gphou-66-98-240-6.ev1servers.net=20
      4 81 10 2  129.250.10.229
ge-1-13.r04.hstntx01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net=20
      5 2 2 1  129.250.2.230 xe-0-1-0.r21.hstntx01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net=20
      6 7 7 7  129.250.4.68 p64-1-3-0.r21.dllstx09.us.bb.gin.ntt.net=20
      7 7 7 7  154.54.11.193 t8-3.mpd01.dfw03.atlas.cogentco.com=20
      8 7 7 7  154.54.6.57 t3-2.mpd01.dfw01.atlas.cogentco.com=20
      9 27 27 30  154.54.5.170 t7-2.mpd01.mci01.atlas.cogentco.com=20
      10 27 27 27  154.54.2.234 t2-3.mpd01.ord01.atlas.cogentco.com=20
      11 27 27 28  154.54.5.18 v3489.mpd01.ord03.atlas.cogentco.com=20
      12 27 28 28  38.112.242.70 =
midphase_services_inc.demarc.cogentco.com=20
      13 29 Timed out Timed out  205.234.228.37 unknown.ord.scnet.net=20
      14 28 28 27  216.246.22.30 unknown.midphase.com=20


There are a total of 271 images that I am the copyright owner of. They =
are contained in the following directory -
http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=3Dcollection&id=3D1

I have never granted permission to ANY individual or corporation for use
=
of these photos for any means whatsoever, including, but not limited to
=
display on a web page.

Furthermore, the website in question is in violation of U.S.C. 18 2257 =
as they are displaying sexually explicit content without proper display
=
of the custodian of records.=20

To further "show my position". I offer the following:

The galleries contained in =
http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=3Dalbum&id=3D15 are mere =
thumbs. They do not link to fullsize images. These are my images and I =
believe the webmaster obviously was unable to obtain the full size =
images.

All the images (while not mine) in the following gallery =
http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=3Dcollection&id=3D3 are =
watermarket by different companies and probably stolen content as well.

As a first step I am requesting that these images be taken down =
immediately.

Secondly, I will be filing the necessary papers to gain the identity of
=
the webmaster in question for future legal proceedings.

The display of these images is causing irreversible harm to the =
individual whose photos are illegaly being displayed as a certain =
individual is presently providing the link to all his friends on various
=
social networking sites.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this =
notification is accurate and that, for each image contained in the =
following directory =
http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=3Dcollection&id=3D1 ,  I  own
=
the copyright. Failure to take these images down will result in civil =
action.

Respectfully,
Lloyd Cox

This message has been sent to both planet.com and midphase hosting.=20
